title: Leilaka: Han Storm: The Chronicles of Han:
description: "Leilaka! Birth place of physical experiences. Seeding Planet for Creation. Some will say a work of fantasy. I beg to differ. I am Han, and this is my life-memory . . ."-Han Storm  A brand new flavour of experience. After 400 years in the Universe of Kraita, Han is saturated with the same kind of adventures. On a faraway planet, in another Universe, he starts out on a new adventure in the physical body of a teenager. Join Han Storm in this unique adventure in learning to become human.Available direct from author www.chroniclesofhan.comExcerpts available on https://www.wattpad.com/story/1003957...
author: H.  Gibson
